dsOverview.title: Global Ocean Wind Stress, climatology and monthly, by Trenberth et al.

summary.p: The ECMWF analyses for 1980-1989 were used to derive a global year-month wind stress climatology. Several climate monthly mean grids were also formed. Wind component grids are also available as are standard deviation grids for each variable computed.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: UCAR/NCAR/CGD > Climate and Global Dynamics Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
ECMWF > European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Oceans > Ocean Winds > Wind Stress
EARTH SCIENCE > Oceans > Ocean Winds > Surface Winds

reference.authorList: Trenberth, K.E., W.G. Large, and J.G. Olson
reference.title: A Global Ocean Wind Stress Climatology Based on ECMWF Analyses
